EmailTemplate.name: SWBR-202309-HP-GOVT-MHPA-WEBINAR.01c - Invite #3 (Save your spot for fresh tips
EmailTemplate.subject: Save your spot for fresh tips on engaging Medicaid members
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Engaging the Hard to Reach: Diabetes Management for High-Risk Medicaid Populations September 6 | 2 p.m. Eastern Deploying innovative approaches to chronic condition management is hard in any environment, but especially challenging in a time of redeterminations and structural change across the Medicaid market. Join our webinar to learn how Teladoc Health and Amerigroup partnered to deploy an innovative Diabetes Management solution to high-risk Medicaid populations in Texas and Nebraska. During this webinar, attendees will gain: - Understanding of the program and its goals - Clarity about how Amerigroup and Teladoc Health partnered to exceed engagement targets - Insight into clinical results and estimated HEDIS impact from this program Presenters: Shannon Stepp Senior Director of Health Plan Strategy, Teladoc Health Adrian Sovik, RN Regional Director of Healthcare Management, Amerigroup Hunter Sinclair Vice President of Solution Strategy, Teladoc Health About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
